name: part_007
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2021】ゲストもいっぱい！楽しんじゃお！✨【3DLIVE】 [NuOJhtBC7R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Shijoshugi Ad Truck'.
MC section where Towa, Watame, and Kanata talk about their first collaboration and joke about their relationship.
Performance of the song 'BLUE CLAPPER' with a special birthday countdown for Towa.

subtitles.original: 所詮使い捨ての消耗品だと？
subtitles.english: So I'm just a disposable consumer product?

subtitles.original: おお今に見とけよ パッと仕掛けてやるわ
subtitles.english: Oh, just you watch, I'll set it off in an instant

subtitles.original: 夜に雪崩れる星の花
subtitles.english: Flowers of stars cascading into the night

subtitles.original: また一つ指で押し開けていく
subtitles.english: I'll push open another one with my finger

subtitles.original: 祈り横滑りさせる
subtitles.english: Letting my prayers slide across

subtitles.original: 閉塞したままの感情は鮮度が漏れる手前
subtitles.english: My clogged emotions are on the verge of losing their freshness

subtitles.original: 掠らされた理想 退廃と現実
subtitles.english: A grazed ideal, decadence and reality

subtitles.original: 嗚呼正解を
subtitles.english: Ah, for the right answer

subtitles.original: 至上主義アドトラック
subtitles.english: Supremacy Ad Truck

subtitles.original: 四六時中を駆け回る
subtitles.english: Running around 24/7

subtitles.original: 所詮使い捨ての消耗品だと？
subtitles.english: So I'm just a disposable consumer product?

subtitles.original: もっと意地になってよ パッと打ち上げてよ
subtitles.english: Be more stubborn, launch it with a bang

subtitles.original: 夜を飲み込む星の花
subtitles.english: Flowers of stars swallowing the night

subtitles.original: 所詮役立たずの代用品だと？
subtitles.english: So I'm just a useless substitute?

subtitles.original: おお今に見とけよ パッと仕掛けてやるわ
subtitles.english: Oh, just you watch, I'll set it off in an instant

subtitles.original: 夜に揺蕩う星の花
subtitles.english: Flowers of stars swaying in the night

subtitles.original: また空に散りばめられていく
subtitles.english: Scattered across the sky once again

subtitles.original: 祈り求め舞い上がる
subtitles.english: Soaring, seeking prayers

subtitles.original: 至上主義アドトラック
subtitles.english: Supremacy Ad Truck

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Yes! So!

subtitles.original: 4曲目は「至上主義アドトラック」でした！
subtitles.english: The fourth song was "Shijoshugi Ad Truck"!

subtitles.original: 角巻わためとかなたと一緒に歌いました！
subtitles.english: I sang it with Tsunomaki Watame and Kanata!

subtitles.original: とっても難しい曲！
subtitles.english: A very difficult song!

subtitles.original: こんな難しい曲を...
subtitles.english: Such a difficult song...

subtitles.original: ...この二人と一緒に歌えて良かったです。
subtitles.english: ...I'm glad I could sing it with these two.

subtitles.original: 楽しく歌わせてもらって...ちょっとやばい、息が...
subtitles.english: I had fun singing... wait, I'm out of breath...

subtitles.original: 引き継ぎ大変だからね、この曲。
subtitles.english: The handovers are tough in this song.

subtitles.original: そうそう、本当。楽しかったね。
subtitles.english: Right, truly. It was fun.

subtitles.original: そう、実はさ、かなたとトワは歌ったことあって。
subtitles.english: So, actually, Kanata and Towa have sung together before.

subtitles.original: そう、かなたとわためもあるんだよね。
subtitles.english: Right, and Kanata and Watame have too.

subtitles.original: でもトワとわため実はなくて。
subtitles.english: But Towa and Watame actually haven't.

subtitles.original: 実は不仲なんだよなあ。
subtitles.english: Actually, we're on bad terms, aren't we?

subtitles.original: 私は好きだよ。チューして。チューして。
subtitles.english: I like you. Give me a kiss. Kiss me.

subtitles.original: 逃げろ、トワ！逃げろー！
subtitles.english: Run, Towa! Run!

subtitles.original: ということで今日はね、3人で初めて出し、
subtitles.english: So today was the first time for the three of us,

subtitles.original: わためとも初めてで歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english: and my first time singing with Watame.

subtitles.original: 良かった。でもすごくバランスとかも楽しかった。
subtitles.english: It was good. I really enjoyed the balance too.

subtitles.original: はい、またありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you again!

subtitles.original: 手を上げて
subtitles.english: Put your hands up

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands, all the way across the sea

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands, hope it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら一緒に
subtitles.english: Come on, together

subtitles.original: Everybody Clap Your Hands 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody Clap Your Hands, all the way to the sky

subtitles.original: Clap Your Hands 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap Your Hands, hope it resonates

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光差す僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: The light shines on our future

subtitles.original: 5! 今日はトワ様のバースデー！
subtitles.english: 5! Today is Towa-sama's birthday!

subtitles.original: 4! 祝おうトワ様！
subtitles.english: 4! Let's celebrate, Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: 2! トワ様お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: 2! Towa-sama, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: BLUE CLAPPER
subtitles.english: BLUE CLAPPER

subtitles.original: 始まりを数えたい
subtitles.english: I want to count the beginnings

subtitles.original: 待っても意味ないタイミング
subtitles.english: Timing where waiting is meaningless

subtitles.original: あの魚みたいに Swimming Swimming
subtitles.english: Like that fish, Swimming Swimming

subtitles.original: 引き寄せるのはいい
subtitles.english: Drawing it in is fine

subtitles.original: まだ見えない夢を
subtitles.english: A dream I can't see yet

subtitles.original: この先には何があるの？
subtitles.english: What lies ahead?

subtitles.original: また速い予定地
subtitles.english: A fast-approaching destination again

subtitles.original: 追いつくまでの刺激
subtitles.english: The thrill until I catch up

subtitles.original: でもたまに止まって Thinking Thinking
subtitles.english: But sometimes I stop, Thinking Thinking

subtitles.original: 変えて見せるチェンジ
subtitles.english: I'll show you a change

subtitles.original: 踏み出すこのステップ
subtitles.english: This step I take

subtitles.original: 掴んで見せるキラキラな毎日
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can grab those sparkling days

subtitles.original: 叶う日まで story つなぐから
subtitles.english: Connecting the story until the day it comes true

subtitles.original: だって君にずっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: Because I want you to keep watching me forever
